annonstext:
- 5 to 10 + Years of experience in Robotic Simulation
 - Work independent on BIW Robotic Simulation (Configuration, Cell building, reach-ability & feasibility           study, tool validation, robot selection, spot distribution, gun selection etc.)

 - Work on different customer standards (Volvo/VW/AUDI/BMW/DAG/JLR) using various software platforms (PDPS/DELMIA)

-  Work on RCS configuration with Simulation (RRS) and Offline Programming   (OLP) download with signaling

- Work on simulation documentation (Ergonomics/Safety/Cycle time chart/Gun sections/OLP download)
- Work on necessary Quality checks, reviews with team and customer and   knowledge sharing
  Primary Skill

 BIW Assembly line Simulation (Pre engineering/process planning/robotic simulation, layout & Cycle time optimization), Automotive Manufacturing Domain Knowledge, Software skills (ROBCAD and PDPS with RCS configuration), Exposure to Delmia will be an added advantage, Good Communication

Mandatory requirements: 
-Hands-on CATIAV5R19SP9HF69_ CARISMA , Delmia, UGNX
-5 + years of experience
-English, Hindi, Marathi-Speaking and writing fluent
